name: XML to BQ Flex template
description: dataflow flex template for batch ingestion of XML files to BigQuery or json files

parameters.name: input
parameters.label: Source File Path
parameters.helpText: Specify Source Path to folder containing the input XML files

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: BQ output dataset
parameters.helpText: Specify BQ Output dataset in form of 'project:dataset' (tables 'orders' and 'customers' will be created automatically) or json file(example.json)

parameters.name: sdk_location
parameters.label: location of apache beam SDK.
parameters.helpText: use value 'container' since we are using Apache beam SDK from a base container
